name: timestamp
description: This is the unix timestamp for the time the message was received by the original receiver.  You should use this as the effective timestamp for the message

name: internal_id
description: Internal Vessel ID. this is the record id provided by the source (registry number, matricula, plate, etc...)

name: msgid
description: [GFW] Unique identifier for this message generated during ingestion

name: ssvid
description: [GFW] Unique identifier for the vessel generated during ingestion

name: source_tenant
description: [GFW] The proprietary of the data (Eg: country)

name: ingested_at
description: [GFW] The exact moment this record was ingested by us (GFW) this is when the raw record is stored in our raw BQ tables

name: timestamp_date
description: This is the day when the message was received by the original receiver in UTC
